Command.CommandString: SELECT * FROM CMD_Warehouse where {0} order by WarehouseCode
DELETE FROM CMD_WAREHOUSE WHERE WarehouseCode='{0}'
Insert into CMD_WAREHOUSE (WarehouseCode,WarehouseName,MEMO) values(@WarehouseCode,@WarehouseName,@MEMO)
update CMD_WAREHOUSE set WarehouseCode=@WarehouseCode,WarehouseName=@WarehouseName,MEMO=@MEMO where WarehouseCode={0}
SELECT * FROM CMD_Area where {0} order by AreaCode
delete from CMD_Area WHERE AreaCode='{0}'
Insert into CMD_Area(WarehouseCode,AreaCode,AreaName,Memo) values(@WarehouseCode,@AreaCode,@AreaName,@Memo)
update CMD_Area set AreaName=@AreaName,Memo=@Memo where AreaCode={0}
SELECT *,substring(ShelfCode,4,3) ShelfRow FROM CMD_Shelf where {0} ORDER BY ShelfCode,AreaCode
delete from CMD_Shelf WHERE ShelfCode='{0}'
Insert into CMD_Shelf (WarehouseCode,AreaCode,ShelfCode,ShelfName,Rows,Columns,Memo,IsActive) values(@WarehouseCode,@AreaCode,@ShelfCode,@ShelfName,@Rows,@Columns,@Memo,@IsActive)
update CMD_Shelf set ShelfName=@ShelfName,Rows=@Rows,Columns=@Columns,WarehouseCode=@WarehouseCode,AreaCode=@AreaCode,IsActive=@IsActive,Memo=@Memo where ShelfCode='{0}'
SELECT * FROM VCell_CMD_Shelf where {0} ORDER BY ShelfCode,AreaCode
select distinct CellColumn from CMD_Cell WHERE {0} ORDER BY CellColumn
select * from CMD_Cell WHERE {0} ORDER BY AreaCode,ShelfCode,CellCode
select CMD_Cell.* from CMD_Cell Left Join CMD_Shelf On CMD_Cell.ShelfCode=CMD_Shelf.ShelfCode WHERE {0} ORDER BY CMD_Cell.AreaCode,CMD_Cell.ShelfCode,CMD_Cell.CellCode
delete from CMD_Cell WHERE CellCode='{0}'
Insert into CMD_Cell(CellCode,CellName,AreaCode,ShelfCode,CellRow,CellColumn,IsActive,IsLock,Memo) values(@CellCode,@CellName,@AreaCode,@ShelfCode,@CellRow,@CellColumn,@IsActive,@IsLock,@Memo)
update CMD_Cell set AreaCode=@AreaCode,IsActive=@IsActive,Memo=@Memo where {0}

select WarehouseCode as id,'0' as pid,'仓库：'+WarehouseName as name from CMD_Warehouse union all select AreaCode as id,WarehouseCode as PID, '库区:'+AreaName as name from CMD_Area union all select ShelfCode as id,AreaCode as PID,'货架:'+ShelfName as name from CMD_Shelf shelf union all select CellCode as id,ShelfCode as pid,'货位:'+CellName as name from CMD_Cell

select cmd.*, house.WarehouseName,area.AreaName from CMD_ProductCategory cmd inner join CMD_Area area on cmd.AreaCode=area.AreaCode inner join CMD_Warehouse house on area.WarehouseCode=house.WarehouseCode where {0} order by CategoryCode

insert into CMD_ProductCategory(CategoryCode,CategoryName,WarehouseCode,AreaCode,Memo,Creator,CreateDate,Updater,UpdateDate) values(@CategoryCode,@CategoryName,@WarehouseCode,@AreaCode,@Memo,@Creator,getdate(),@Updater,getdate())
update CMD_ProductCategory set CategoryName=@CategoryName,WarehouseCode=@WarehouseCode,AreaCode=@AreaCode,Memo=@Memo,Updater=@Updater,UpdateDate=getdate() where CategoryCode=@CategoryCode
delete from CMD_ProductCategory where CategoryCode in({0})
update CMD_Product set AreaCode=@AreaCode where CategoryCode=@CategoryCode

Select CMD_Crane.*,StateDesc from CMD_Crane inner join Sys_TableState on CMD_Crane.State=Sys_TableState.State and Sys_TableState.FieldName='State' and Sys_TableState.TableName='CMD_Crane' where {0} order by CraneNo
Update CMD_Crane set CraneName=@CraneName,State=@State,Memo=@Memo where CraneNo=@CraneNo
Insert into CMD_Crane(CraneNo,CraneName,Memo,State) values(@CraneNo,@CraneName,@Memo,@State)
Delete from CMD_Crane where {0}

select CMD_Car.*,StateDesc from CMD_Car inner join Sys_TableState on CMD_Car.State=Sys_TableState.State and Sys_TableState.FieldName='State' and Sys_TableState.TableName='CMD_Car' where {0} order by CarNo
Update CMD_Car set CarName=@CarName,State=@State,Memo=@Memo where CarNo=@CarNo
Insert into CMD_Car(CarNo,CarName,Memo,State) values(@CarNo,@CarName,@Memo,@State)
Delete from CMD_Car where {0}
Select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by CIGARETTECODE) as RowIndex,* from AS_BI_CIGARETTE where {0} order by CIGARETTECODE
Select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by BillTypeCode) as RowIndex,* from CMD_BillType where {0} order by BillTypeCode
delete from CMD_COLOR WHERE ID in({0})

INSERT INTO CMD_COLOR(ID,COLOR_CODE,PRODUCT_CODE,PRODUCT_Model,COLOR_NAME,MEMO,Creator, CreateDate, Updater, UpdateDate) values(@ID,@COLOR_CODE,@PRODUCT_CODE,@PRODUCT_Model,@COLOR_NAME,@MEMO, @Creator, getdate(), @Updater, getdate())
Update CMD_COLOR Set COLOR_CODE=@COLOR_CODE,COLOR_NAME=@COLOR_NAME,PRODUCT_CODE=@PRODUCT_CODE,MEMO=@MEMO,PRODUCT_Model=@PRODUCT_Model,Updater=@Updater, UpdateDate=getdate() where ID={0}
Select * from CMD_BillType where {0} order by BillTypeCode
delete from CMD_BillType WHERE BillTypeCode in({0})

INSERT INTO CMD_BillType(Flag,BillTypeCode,BillTypeName,TaskType,TaskLevel,Memo, Creator, CreateDate, Updater, UpdateDate) values(@Flag,@BillTypeCode,@BillTypeName,@TaskType,@TaskLevel,@Memo, @Creator, getdate(), @Updater, getdate())
Update CMD_BillType Set BillTypeName=@BillTypeName,Memo=@Memo,Updater=@Updater, UpdateDate=getdate() where BillTypeCode=@BillTypeCode
select * from VCMD_Product where {0}
delete from CMD_PRODUCT WHERE ProductCode in('{0}')

INSERT INTO CMD_PRODUCT(ProductCode, ProductName, Spec, Weight,IsProduce,ValidPeriod, Memo, Creator, CreateDate, Updater, UpdateDate, WarehouseCode, AreaCode,ProductNo) values(@ProductCode, @ProductName, @Spec, @Weight,@IsProduce, @ValidPeriod, @Memo, @Creator, getdate(), @Updater,getdate(), @WarehouseCode, @AreaCode,@ProductNo)

Update CMD_PRODUCT Set ProductName=@ProductName, Spec=@Spec, Weight=@Weight,IsProduce=@IsProduce,ValidPeriod=@ValidPeriod,ProductNo=@ProductNo, Memo=@Memo,Updater=@Updater,UpdateDate=getdate() where ProductCode=@ProductCode
select * from CMD_ProductNo where {0}
sp_BatchChangeProductNo

Select Factory.*,State.StateDesc from CMD_Factory Factory left join Sys_TableState State on Factory.Flag=State.State and State.TableName='CMD_Factory' and State.FieldName='Flag' where {0} order by Flag,FactoryID
delete from CMD_Factory WHERE FactoryID in({0})

INSERT INTO CMD_Factory(FactoryID, Flag,FactoryName, LinkPerson, LinkPhone, Fax, Address, MEMO,Creator, CreateDate, Updater, UpdateDate) values(@FactoryID,@Flag,@FactoryName,@LinkPerson,@LinkPhone,@Fax,@Address,@MEMO, @Creator, getdate(), @Updater, getdate())

Update CMD_Factory Set FactoryName=@FactoryName,Flag=@Flag,LinkPerson=@LinkPerson,LinkPhone=@LinkPhone,Fax=@Fax, Address=@Address, MEMO=@MEMO,Updater=@Updater, UpdateDate=getdate() where FactoryID='{0}'
Select * from CMD_TrainType where {0} order by TypeCode
delete from CMD_TrainType WHERE TypeCode in({0})
INSERT INTO CMD_TrainType(TypeCode,TypeName,MEMO,Creator, CreateDate, Updater, UpdateDate) values(@TypeCode,@TypeName,@MEMO, @Creator, getdate(), @Updater, getdate())
Update CMD_TrainType Set TypeName=@TypeName, MEMO=@MEMO,Updater=@Updater, UpdateDate=getdate() where TypeCode='{0}'
delete from CMD_ProductState WHERE StateNo in({0})
INSERT INTO CMD_ProductState(StateNo,StateName,MEMO,Creator, CreateDate, Updater, UpdateDate) values(@StateNo,@StateName,@MEMO, @Creator, getdate(), @Updater, getdate())
Update CMD_ProductState Set StateName=@StateName,MEMO=@MEMO,Updater=@Updater, UpdateDate=getdate() where StateNo='{0}'

select WAREHOUSE_CODE as id,'0' as pid,'仓库：'+WAREHOUSE_NAME as name from CMD_WAREHOUSE where IsManage=1 union all select AREA_CODE as id,WAREHOUSE_CODE as PID, '库区:'+AREA_NAME as name from CMD_WH_AREA union all select SHELF_CODE as id,AREA_CODE as PID,'货架:'+SHELF_NAME as name from CMD_WH_SHELF
SELECT * FROM View_CMD_CELL_ALL WHERE WarehouseCode = @WareHouse ORDER BY SHELFCODE,CELLCODE
SELECT * FROM View_CMD_CELL_ALL WHERE AREACODE = @AreaCode ORDER BY SHELFCODE,CELLCODE
SELECT * FROM View_CMD_CELL_ALL WHERE {0} ORDER BY SHELFCODE,CELLCODE
SELECT * FROM View_CMD_CELL_ALL WHERE CellCode = @CellCode
